task.shortdesc: Store managers may need to create shifts for a partner using Modified Duty (Canada worker's compensation, workplace injury, etc). This job code should only be used with direction from a Worker's Compensation Specialist.
task.taskbody:
Note: Modified Duty is to be used only to account for work hours associated with accommodating a partner injured by a workplace incident and is not to be used when accommodating a partner due to their personal medical needs. Questions about this code usage can be sent to: WCCanada@Starbucks.com
Navigate to the Scheduling task on the TeamWorks menu and select Schedule Editor and click on New Shift
Select the applicable partner and enter date, start and end times
Select Modified Duty as the Job
Select Apply
New Modified Duty shift is scheduled
